location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'File 7/13 Customs exemption for acting Consular officers in Iran'

physicalDescription.extent: This file is arranged approximately in chronological order.
Foliation: The foliation sequence runs from the front cover to the back cover. It appears in pencil, uncircled, in the top right corner of the recto of the page. Foliation anomalies: 1A-1C.

mods.abstract: This file contains correspondence between Lieutenant-Colonel Gordon Percy Loch, Political Agent at Bahrain and the Political Residency at Bushire concerning Loch's eligibility for an exemption from customs duties should he return to Bushire to act for Lieutenant-Colonel Trenchard Craven William Fowle, the Political Resident.
